ghr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get a response from the GitHub API.

Source: R/gh_get.R
gh_get.Rd

Get a response from the GitHub API.

gh_get(path, ref = "master")

Arguments

path

A string formatted as "owner/repo/subdir_1/subdir_2/subdir_n".
ref

Branch name.

Value

A list.

See also

ghr_fields

Other functions to get github responses: gh_branches

Examples

gh_get("r-lib/usethis")
#> [
#>   {
#>     "name": ".Rbuildignore",

# The request to GitHub happens only the first time you call gh_get()
system.time(gh_get("r-lib/usethis/R"))
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.036   0.000   0.137 
# Later calls take no time because the first call is memoised
system.time(gh_get("r-lib/usethis/R"))
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.000   0.000   0.001 

ghr_path(gh_get("r-lib/usethis", ref = "gh-pages"))
#>  [1] "CNAME"                "CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html" "CONTRIBUTING.html"   
#>  [4] "ISSUE_TEMPLATE.html"  "LICENSE.html"         "SUPPORT.html"        
#>  [7] "articles"             "authors.html"         "dev"                 
#> [10] "docsearch.css"        "docsearch.js"         "index.html"          
#> [13] "link.svg"             "news"                 "pkgdown.css"         
#> [16] "pkgdown.js"           "pkgdown.yml"          "principles.html"     
#> [19] "reference"            "sitemap.xml"         
# Same
ghr_path(gh_get("r-lib/usethis@gh-pages"))
#>  [1] "CNAME"                "CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html" "CONTRIBUTING.html"   
#>  [4] "ISSUE_TEMPLATE.html"  "LICENSE.html"         "SUPPORT.html"        
#>  [7] "articles"             "authors.html"         "dev"                 
#> [10] "docsearch.css"        "docsearch.js"         "index.html"          
#> [13] "link.svg"             "news"                 "pkgdown.css"         
#> [16] "pkgdown.js"           "pkgdown.yml"          "principles.html"     
#> [19] "reference"            "sitemap.xml"         
ghr_path(gh_get("r-lib/usethis/news@gh-pages"))
#> [1] "news/index.html"
